components.text: Here's a preview of something interesting I've been working on. All I'll say right now (until I have more to show) is that is uses my newest multi-threaded, TCP enabled Java 2D game engine, and it's like having a model railway on your PC. And after swapping a few BufferedImages for Bitmaps, possibly in your pocket!
• Sixteen types of placeable track (straight, curves, crossrails, points)
• A depot with GUI that enables creation of services from the top left
• Intelligent navigation of all track and points, including stop signals
• Text file saving/loading of complete maps, except services.
